mapper.select:
select id, hosp_code, out_id, item_code, item_id, item_name, spec, num, unit_code, dosage, dosage_unit_code, buy_price, sell_price, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, split_ratio, split_num, split_price, split_unit_code, batch_no, expiry_date, (select name from base_product where hosp_code = a.hosp_code and code = ( select prod_code from base_drug where hosp_code = a.hosp_code and id = a.item_id union all select prod_code from base_material where hosp_code = a.hosp_code and id = a.item_id ) )as productName, case a.item_code when '1' then ( select nation_code from base_drug where hosp_code = a.hosp_code and id = a.item_id) when '2' then (select nation_code from base_material where hosp_code = a.hosp_code and id = a.item_id) end nationCode, case a.item_code when '1' then ( select nation_name from base_drug where hosp_code = a.hosp_code and id = a.item_id) when '2' then (select nation_name from base_material where hosp_code = a.hosp_code and id = a.item_id) end nationName from stro_out_detail a where a.hosp_code=#{hospCode}
and a.out_id=#{outId}
